price: 9. En Farao en degenen vóór hem, en de omvergeworpen steden begingen zonden.
arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wajāa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi-ati
